question: Hemkund Sahib, which was recently in news, is located in which of the following states?
explanation: Hemkund Sahib is a Sikh place of worship and pilgrimage site in Chamoli district of Uttarakhand.  It is devoted to Guru Gobind Singh the tenth Sikh Guru. It is located in the Himalayas at an elevation of 4,632 meters. It is situated in the banks of Hemkund Lake which is also known as Lake of Snow. [source]
